Berin Loritsch wrote:

>I was writing a testcase, and realized that with all the assertion
>methods
>in junit.framework.Assert, there is no assertEquals(double, double).
>There
>are versions for integers, longs, shorts, chars, Obejcts, etc.  Is this
>just
>an oversight?
>

It's in there as:

    assertEquals(double expected, double actual, double delta);

Mike
